img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 44.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/36/Wukong_UpperHollow_44.jpg)
Head back to the Pool of Shattered Jade Shrine, and look back to the path where the Scorpion Prince was to spot a large wooden scaffold bridge. Be sure to check around the left side first for a green Wisp, then cross the two-tiered bridge to drop down a level.
img_below_text:
Look out for an archer on the lower floor here, and get rid of him before crossing the bridge to find a ledge with another green Wisp.
![Wukong UpperHollow 46.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_UpperHollow_46.jpg)
summary_promot:

        - Following Text: "Look out for an archer on the lower floor here, and get rid of him before crossing the bridge to find a ledge with another green Wisp.
![Wukong UpperHollow 46.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/fe/Wukong_UpperHollow_46.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image shows the player character in *Black Myth: Wukong* standing on a wooden scaffold bridge, holding a glowing staff. The scene highlights a downward path indicated by a red arrow, suggesting the next step in the exploration. The environment features a dark, rocky area with vegetation and a glowing light in the distance, aligning with the guide's instructions to navigate the bridge and descend to the next level.
